description.en:
Angelie, distraught after learning that she had been sold by her family, wanted to take a shortcut to end her life on the highway. 'Goodbye everyone,' Angelie said as she waited for her body to be crushed by a speeding motorcycle. But fate would have it differently. The motorcyclist, Billy Vodka, turns out to be quite adept at controlling his motorcycle and stopping. Even Billy, who turns out to be a fugitive, rescues and takes Angelie with him.

What will happen to the two of them? What can a violent fugitive learn from a woman who has lost everything?

(Source: official synopsis, translated)
description.id:
Angelie yang putus asa karena mengetahui ia telah dijual keluarganya, hendak mengambil solusi pintas mengakhiri hidupnya di jalan raya. 'Selamat tinggal semuanya' ujar Angelie saat ia menunggu detik-detik tubuhnya akan dilumat sebuah motor yang berpacu kencang. Namun nasib berkata lain. Sang pengendara motor, Billy Vodka, ternyata cukup mahir menguasai motornya dan berhenti. Bahkan Billy, yang ternyata seorang buronan, sampai hati menyelamatkan dan membawa Angelie.

Apa yang akan terjadi pada mereka berdua? Apa yang bisa dipelajari seorang buronan bengis dari seorang perempuan yang telah kehilangan segalanya?

(Sumber: sinopsis resmi)
